body:
Heey schmenni here,
I'm so sour, because the players of Quollcraft had stolen my Map and some other maps from Avicus Network. It's very important that Funky/IvyCode do something agains this stealer !
I know this can be advertising, but you can look at this ripoff ! (http://quollcraft.net/). I can remove it everytime :)
Pls help me, I did a post on their forums, they deleted it :/ and I send them an E-mail.
I don't know what I can do ... :(

replies.body: Alright. This is not really something to take lightly. You have some one stealing so much from us, and we don't do anything about it? Like damn. We need to do something. We can't just leave it. What if it becomes a popular server like mineplex or something. How would we feel? Not happy. Plus, why are some of us mods on that server? I don't understand. They completely steal everything from us and then you help them by being a moderator? I can't understand. We need to stop them.
